DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect food intake plasma concentration profile YNO-5920/YM529 post menopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Food Effect ONO-5920/YM529 Intermittent Formulation
DOC.criteria: Post menopausal woman ( least 2 year menopause ) Body weight : 40.0 Kg less 70.0 Kg BMI : 17.6 less 30.0 Receives investigational drug within 120 day study Blood donation study With abnormal laboratory value
